items.title: Democrats host town halls to fire up supporters -- but is their message resonating?
items.description: Town halls are among the strategies that Democrats are using to try to get their base fired up against the Trump White House.

items.title: Messages with Yemen war plans shared with reporter appears 'authentic': Official
items.description: Members of the Trump administration coordinated highly sensitive Yemen attack plans on an unsecure group chat, a White House official confirmed.

items.title: House Republicans eye hearings on Judge Boasberg, bill to rein in federal judges
